last_episode_to_air.name: The Finish Line
last_episode_to_air.overview: When Jeff gets closer to completing Christina Ricci's kitchen and primary bath, a home inspection reveals further repairs and cosmetic work are needed to get top dollar on her investment. Later, Jeff hosts a bittersweet celebration with his team despite some unfortunate news. With his projects finally wrapping, Jeff puts his full attention back on the extensive remodel of his forever family home.

name: Hollywood Houselift with Jeff Lewis
overview: Jeff Lewis, balancing high-maintenance celebrities and ambitious home design projects while juggling his staff and personal life, which are all a work in progress.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: House flipper, interior designer, and radio host Jeff Lewis is back for a new season of home renovations for some of Hollywood’s brightest stars. With higher stakes, more drama, and even tighter deadlines, Jeff continues to balance his personal life and lean on his team of project managers to bring their all to some of his most demanding transformations yet.

episodes.name: Dreams and Dollar Signs
episodes.overview: Fortune Feimster seeks Jeff's help updating her home's interior, but Jeff proposes a surprising alternative. Wilmer Valderrama wants a family-friendly living space. Jeff finds a dream home, but it may cause a family rift.

episodes.name: Hedge Your Bets
episodes.overview: Jeff meets with Lamorne Morris about a pool house transformation and is surprised by another designer on the project. Fortune's project breaks ground, but Jeff worries about landscaping mishaps. Jeff moves ahead with his dream house plans.

episodes.name: What I Hear Is No Budget
episodes.overview: Jeff continues working on Lamorne's pool house, but is on different pages with the other designer. Anthony Anderson hires Jeff to wrangle a yard renovation this is already overdue and over budget. Wilmer is conflicted on design choices.

episodes.name: A Facelift and a Little Lipo
episodes.overview: Melissa Rivers seeks Jeff's help on a luxury bathroom remodel, but has a strict budget. Fortune's exterior renovation wraps. Work begins on Anthony's yard, but the project comes to a quick halt when problems below the surface arise.

episodes.name: Make It Aspen-y
episodes.overview: Jeff has to manage Melissa's expectations and budget, and oversees the next phase of Anthony's project to avoid delays. Ashlee Simpson-Ross and Evan Ross want to renovate their bedroom, but challenge Jeff with their eclectic taste.

episodes.name: We'll Always Have Capri
episodes.overview: Jeff and Wilmer align on the family space until artwork choices cause a conflict. Ashlee and Evan get restless with delays. Jeff meets with Mira Sorvino and her husband Christopher Backus to restore a Malibu space damaged by wildfire.

episodes.name: Soften the Hardscape
episodes.overview: Jeff works to balance design needs on Anthony's project. Demo begins on Mira's project, but old plumbing proves to be a problem. Roselyn Sanchez enlists Jeff's help to build a multipurpose workspace and podcast studio.

episodes.name: If the Couch Fits...
episodes.overview: Jeff deals with an installation issue and client concerns on Anthony's project. Jeff's team gets creative on Ashlee and Evan's project when budget gets tight. Fortune re-enlists Jeff for interior upgrades.

episodes.name: Family Hot Tub
episodes.overview: Jeff and his team rush to put the finishing touches on Roselyn's podcast space. Mira's project is threatened when some unexpected visitors hang in the pool. Big changes are on the horizon for Jeff.

episodes.name: The End is the Beginning
episodes.overview: Jeff and his team scramble to complete Anthony's yard landscaping after the expensive olive trees arrive damaged. Jeff prepares to move out of his Hollywood Hills home and move forward with an embryo transfer.

episodes.name: Dazzle Me, Jeff
episodes.overview: Actor Josh Duhamel and his new wife, Audra, enlist Jeff’s help in transforming his bachelor pad into a sophisticated space they can both enjoy; meanwhile, new mom and actress Gina Rodriguez and her husband, Joe, hope to restore the romance on their primary suite balcony. Later, Jeff visits the construction of his new dream home and Anthony Anderson is back to finally complete his backyard oasis.

episodes.name: Back in the Closet
episodes.overview: Jeff takes on new client, fashion designer Sara Foster, to rethink the layout of her primary bedroom and closet, but quickly realizes that the problem is much bigger than he ever imagined; later, Josh Duhamel’s project makes a pivot and Gina Rodriguez and her husband, Joe encounter unexpected guests nearing the finish line of their backyard transformation.

episodes.name: Tiffany Blues
episodes.overview: All-star NFL running back Reggie Bush invites Jeff over to his 9,000 square foot compound to re-envision a small bedroom that his three children share. Meanwhile, Josh Duhamel’s top-of-the-line wish list for his primary suite increases the budget further than expected, and Sara Foster has a surprising reaction to Jeff and Tyler’s unique design plan for her new dressing room closet.

episodes.name: Every Day is Christmas
episodes.overview: Emmy-nominated actress Christina Ricci is looking to sell her traditional family home, but first needs Jeff's expertise to add resale value to the kitchen and primary bathroom. Meanwhile, Reggie Bush's kids get involved in the action of their new bedroom, while Josh Duhamel's project presents a thousand-pound headache.

episodes.name: Excess Baggage
episodes.overview: Real Housewives of Atlanta star Cynthia Bailey needs help getting comfortable in her daughter's home, but Jeff must get to the heart of much deeper issues to make this mother-daughter remodel a success. Later, things get a little hot designing Christina Ricci's kitchen and primary bathroom. Anthony Anderson's outdoor kitchen progress comes to a halt when permit delays throw a wrench in the plans.

episodes.name: Beck and Call
episodes.overview: Jeff brings in two new clients. First, social media star Noah Beck needs help creating an upscale living space in his new West Hollywood townhouse. Then, actress Regina Hall seeks the team to fix the awkward layout of her rental property. As Jeff moves at lightning speed to remedy Anthony's backyard mishap, a hiccup in Christina Ricci's project management calls the team's loyalty into question.

episodes.name: Who’s The Boss?
episodes.overview: Actress Kate Bosworth needs Jeff’s help to complete her idyllic backyard with an inspired mid-century modern outdoor pavilion. Meanwhile, Regina Hall’s rental property gets a new layout complete with a beautiful, bold facelift in two unique spaces. Jeff buries the hatchet after a fallout with his team to get Christina Ricci’s project back on track.

episodes.name: Million Dollar Backyard
episodes.overview: Christina Ricci’s project kicks into high gear for her kitchen and primary bathroom, but Jeff realizes that the renovation will only go so far without cleaning up the exteriors to maximize curb appeal. Meanwhile, Jeff and team encounter unexpected territory as they break ground on Kate Bosworth’s outdoor pool house and the completion of Anthony Anderson’s backyard oasis enters the final stretch.

episodes.name: Gus What Happens
episodes.overview: When hands-on Kate Bosworth leaves town in the middle of her renovation, Jeff goes the distance to keep the project moving and her mind at ease. Meanwhile, Jeff pivots the original approach of Christina’s kitchen and primary bath for a bolder, high-end design to raise the value of the house. Later, Jeff hires a new house manager, Gus, in an attempt to fill Nancy’s shoes.

episodes.name: The Finish Line
episodes.overview: When Jeff gets closer to completing Christina Ricci's kitchen and primary bath, a home inspection reveals further repairs and cosmetic work are needed to get top dollar on her investment. Later, Jeff hosts a bittersweet celebration with his team despite some unfortunate news. With his projects finally wrapping, Jeff puts his full attention back on the extensive remodel of his forever family home.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: House flipper, interior designer, and radio host Jeff Lewis is back for a new season of home renovations for some of Hollywood’s brightest stars. With higher stakes, more drama, and even tighter deadlines, Jeff continues to balance his personal life and lean on his team of project managers to bring their all to some of his most demanding transformations yet.
